itunes:title: Psalm 119 Week 1 with Kristie Anyabwile
title: Psalm 119 Week 1 with Kristie Anyabwile
description:
For the first week of our Psalm 119 series, Raechel and Amanda chat with author, Bible teacher, and lover of God’s Word, Kristie Anyabwile. The three have a “Psalm 119 party” as they discuss the structure and themes of this unique psalm and what it means to truly delight in God’s Word. Kristie also offers some great tips for Scripture memorization and provides us with the encouragement we need to start memorizing verses—or even whole books of the Bible! The three women consistently come back to one theme: God’s Word is for God’s people, and we are meant to delight in it. 

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 1 of the She Reads Truth Psalm 119: We Delight in Your Word reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com

Shop the Psalm 119: We Delight in Your Word collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com. 

Save 20% on your first Subscription Box when you use the code SUB20. July’s box will include our upcoming Ephesians Study Book.

Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/psalm-119-week-1-with-kristie-anyabwile/
